data.text: @JohnBeaudoinSr I asked for this a whole year ago. The data exists in the UK. They will not release it. We go to court.
@mdccclxx Our legislatures in USA should pass a law immediately that death certificates require dates of covid vax. That would solve all this.

@mdccclxx I am not a scientist, but i had a tweet a few weeks ago where someone said to me the vaxx saves your life, covid kills you because of the spike protein! I said just well you keep injecting the spike protein then, i wont!
@cockadoodledog @mdccclxx That is why they invented long Covid. It won’t matter how long ago they had Covid and how recently they had the jab it will be “long Covid” 🤷‍♀️
@cockadoodledog @mdccclxx It depends whether or not they can pin the blame on covid rather than the vaccines. But you're probably right.

@mdccclxx That first one there is disheartening. The frustrating thing is living in Japan, we are months behind and I keep hearing about people going to get their 'boosts.' We are having our absolute worst season of this crap. Kids schools closing repeatedly. More people dying than ever...
@mdccclxx I guess it will totally undeniable by this time next year.  It appears to be getting more frequent.
